thumb.title: 【MV】Henceforth / よつは【歌ってみた】
thumb.description: 【MV】Henceforth / よつは【歌ってみた】2025/4/28 18作目【☆リクエスト曲☆】よつは(4/28)の日！！『 君も歩みを止めないで 』◇Original : Orangestar 様https://youtu.be/L13gCEZJVRU◇Vocal & Movie & MIX : よつはhttps://x.com/yotsuha_utamita◇Illustration : Nenene 様https://x.com/millchi_no*This video is a derivative work in accordance with the original owner's usage regulations. The instrumental sound source is borrowed from the original owner. Additionally, the composition of the videos and illustrations were created with permission from the original music video creator and illustrator, or were created within the scope of the terms of use.▽Cover List*The original author is the best. If you are not good at it, please back up your browser. Also, please refrain from using the name "Yotsuha" in other people's videos.#henceforth #orangestar 様 #歌ってみた #cover #coversong #新人歌い手 #歌ってみた動画 #オリジナルmv #mv ｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰ~よつはのリンク~□YouTube https://www.youtube.com/@yotsuha_utamita□X https://x.com/yotsuha_utamita□Lit.Link https://lit.link/yotsuha428
